thread.title: U.S. Olympians, at the Last Minute - WSJ

author: Jason Gay
title: U.S. Olympians, at the Last Minute - WSJ
text:
Pyeongchang, South Korea
It’s windy at these Winter Olympics, as you’ve probably heard. Not “Hey, that’s a lot of wind” windy. More “Look out for that garbage can!” windy. Events are getting postponed; on Wednesday, organizers closed pedestrian areas in the Olympic Park, urging ticket holders to stay protected in arenas. That’s right: You could have gotten trapped at curling! There are worse ways to spend an evening. Curling rocks.
